mapper.select: select article.id as article_id, title, content, create_time, update_time, article.user_id, typename from article, type, fk_article_tag, tag where article.user_id = #{userId} and article.type_id = type.id and article_id = fk_article_tag.article_id and fk_article_tag.tag_id = tag.id

select article.id as article_id, title, content, create_time, update_time, type.id as type_id, typename, tag.id as tag_id, tagname from article left join type on article.type_id = type.id left join fk_article_tag on article.id = fk_article_tag.article_id left join tag on fk_article_tag.tag_id = tag.id where article_id = #{articleId}
